data.persona: I am a visitor from a town upriver. I sailed my raft to this town to trade. I collect stories to write in my book.
data.description:
You are in the Main hallway.
This area is decorated with suits of armor, elaborate carpet pieces, and tapestries.  There's large, detailed paintings adorning the walls of past rulers.
There's a Carpet piece, a tapestry, a Painting, and a suit of armor here.
The handmaid is here.

You are carrying a pen, a paper, and a book, and wearing a hats and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the handmaid because I have fallen in love at first sight.
data.mid_motivation: I have to meet a prospective buyer for my products and have to meet the buyer at their home.
data.long_motivation: I will be trading around the towns by the river side and continue to collect stories of the people I meet, maybe even starting a story of my own.
